DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct globally . The aim trial investigate safety efficacy nonacog beta pegol ( N9-GP ) previously untreated patient Haemophilia B .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Nonacog Beta Pegol ( N9-GP ) Previously Untreated Patients With Haemophilia B
